attributes.action: Change the law so that injuries sustained as the result of a criminal act (such as theft of electrical cable) CANNOT be treated at taxpayer expense.
attributes.additional_details: Criminals who get injured as a result of their activity do not deserve to be treated at taxpayer expense.  If that results in them not being treated then that is a problem for them and not the taxpayer.  IF YOU CAN'T HANDLE THE MEDICAL BILLS DON'T DO THE CRIME.
